summary: In the peaceful countryside, Vassily opposes the rich kulaks over the coming of collective farming.
cast: Stepan Shkurat|Semyon Svashenko|Yuliya Solntseva|Yelena Maksimova|Nikolai Nademsky|Ivan Franko|Pyotr Masokha|Vladimir Mikhaylov|Pavel Petrik|P. Umanets|Ye. Bondina|Luka Lyashenko|Vasiliy Krasenko|M. Matsyutsia
title: La tierra
